hours_text:
Visit Us[CarnegieArts](https://carnegieartsturlock.org/author/carnegieartsturlock/ "Posts by CarnegieArts")2024-06-05T12:29:29-07:00

### VISIT US

## ADMISSION

**General Admission |** $7  
**Seniors & Students** (with a valid student id) | $5  
**CAC & NARM Members* | **Free  
**Children**(12 & under accompanied by an adult) | Free  
**SNAP EBT Cardholders** ** (and up to 3 guests) | Free

*The CAC is part of NARM a national and international community of museums that invites visitors to experience museums everywhere they go through the benefit of reciprocal membership. Learn more about [NARM](https://narmassociation.org/members/).

**The CAC is a member of the Museums for All program, initiated by the Institute of Museum and Library Services (IMLS), providing free admission to families receiving food assistance benefits (SNAP EBT). Learn more about [Museums for All](https://museums4all.org/).

## HOURS

**Galleries & Gift Shop  
**Tuesday – Saturday 10am – 5pm* 

_***Subject to change at any time  
**_

**The CAC is closed on the following holidays:**  
New Year’s Day  
Fourth of July  
Thanksgiving  
Christmas Day

## GETTING HERE

**Carnegie Arts Center is located at  
**250 N. Broadway  
Turlock, CA 95380

****

**Parking  
**Street parking is available on N. Broadway. Parking is also available in the parking lots behind the CAC (on Florence Street) and in front of the police department.  
Handicapped parking spaces are located in the lot behind the CAC.
